Detailed Description

Handles events and triggers exports based on set conditions.

Definition at line 73 of file trigger_monitor.py.

def src.trigger_monitor.TriggerMonitor.load_config (   self)

Loads and checks the config values from rosparam.

If recommended elements are mising, shows a warning. If mandatory elements are missing, shows an error end exits the program. Some params are none of these, they already have default values that are acceptable.

)

Subscribes to a topic.

If the topic is not advertised by the time of starting this method, it will keep trying indefinitely

Parameters

def src.trigger_monitor.TriggerMonitor.try_subscribe (   self,
  path 
)

Tries to subscribe to a topic.

The subscribtion will be done, if the topic is presented so ROS can provide its type.
